    Class Description
    AbstractGridBagLayoutJPanel
    Abstract class that defines a JComponent with a GridBagLayout as layout manager.
    AbstractPlayer
    Abstract class for player.
    Achievement
    Interface describing an achievement
    AchievementImpl
    Implementation of the Achievement interface.

    An achievement logics manager, holds the current achievements.

    An achievement factory with basic creation methods.

    AchievementsScrollPane  
    AchievementTest

    Interface that defines Arena specifics
    ArenaBody
    Interface that defines the physics body of an arena object.
    ArenaBodyImpl  
    ArenaImpl
    Class that represent arenas the player can play in.
    ArenaLabel  
    CreditsPanel
    Panel to display the creators of the game.
    Difficulty
    The difficulty the enemy AI.
    EnemyPlayer
    An AI controlled player.
    EnemyPlayerImpl
    Implementation of the EnemyPlayer interface.
    ExceptionPanel
    Class that displays the exception message in a dialog and optionally exits.
    GameObject
    interface that defines a game object that needs its state to be updated every frame
    GameObjectWithPhysics
    interface that extends GameObject and adds physics related methods to the GameObject
    GameOverPanel  
    GamePanel  
    GameState
    Interface describing a Game of Air Hockey
    GameStateBuilder
    Builder class for GameState.
    GameStateImpl
    Implementation of GameState interface.
    GameTest  
    GUI
    Main class to start the GUI process.
    IconButton
    Class that creates a button with an icon and predetermined size.
    ImageModifier
    Utility class for modifying images.
    ImageModifierTest  
    JComponentLoader
    Utility class for loading JComponents (mainly JPanels) onto a JFrame.
    Main  
    MainPlayer
    Interface used to represent the main player controlled by the user.
    MainPlayerImpl
    Implementation of the MainPlayer interface.
    MenuPanel  
    ObjectSerializer<O>
    Functional interface to serialize and deserialize a generic object O
    ObjectSerializerTest  
    PausePanel
    Class that extends JPanel and works as a pause menu.
    Physics2D
    Interface for a 2D physics world.
    Physics2DImpl  
    PhysicsTest  
    Player
    The abstract class Player contains the common fields and methods that can be found in any player of the game.
    PlayerBody
    Interface that defines the physics body of a player object.
    PlayerBodyImpl  
    PointPhysicsHandler
    Class used to handle point physics.
    Puck
    Interface that represents a Puck object
    PuckBody
    Interface that defines the physics body of a puck object.
    PuckBodyImpl  
    PuckImpl
    The Puck class representing the puck of the Arena
    ResourceLoader
    A utility class to load images.
    RigidBody
    Interface describing a rigid body.
    RigidBodyImpl
    Generic implementation of a rigid body with default values.
    SerializationTest  
    Settings
    The game settings.
    SettingsPanel  
    Theme
    The available game themes.
    UnitConverter
    Utility class for converting units from one Coordinate System to another.
